product_summary: EasySub is a powerful and affordable AI-powered subtitle generator that can help you add subtitles to your videos quickly and easily. It supports over 150 languages and offers a variety of features to make your videos more accessible and engaging.
product_cons: Can be slow to process long videos
May not be accurate for all accents
Does not offer a free trial
Customer support is not always responsive

product_usecases.use_case: Adding subtitles to videos for accessibility
product_usecases.details: EasySub can help you add subtitles to your videos so that they are accessible to people who are deaf or hard of hearing.

product_usecases.use_case: Transcribing videos for search engine optimization (SEO)
product_usecases.details: EasySub can help you transcribe your videos so that they can be indexed by search engines. This can help you get more traffic to your videos.

product_usecases.use_case: Translating videos for a global audience
product_usecases.details: EasySub can help you translate your videos into multiple languages so that you can reach a global audience.
EasySub can help you create marketing videos that are engaging and informative. You can use EasySub to add subtitles, music, and other effects to your videos.
EasySub can help you create educational videos that are clear and easy to understand. You can use EasySub to add subtitles, annotations, and other features to your videos.

product_toolfor.details: EasySub is a great tool for video creators who want to add subtitles to their videos quickly and easily.
EasySub can help educators create educational videos that are clear and easy to understand.
EasySub can help businesses create marketing videos that are engaging and informative.
EasySub can help non-profits create videos that promote their cause and reach a wider audience.
EasySub is a great tool for individuals who want to add subtitles to their videos for personal use.

product_pricing:
- Free plan: 15 minutes of transcription per month
- Pay-as-you-go plan: $0.2 per minute of transcription
- Pro plan: $48 per month for 20 hours of transcription
